nodes.text: The Rasmal Valley Palace was an opulent palace on the planet Kor Desilijic that was maintained by the Hutt kajidic Desilijic during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The palace was one of Kor Desilijic's grandest estates and contained luxury dwellings and entertainment halls that were large enough to hold hundreds of Desilijic Hutts. The palace was named after Rasmal Desilijic Bansek, a Hutt from ancient times who defeated eight other Hutt clans to claim Kor Desilijic for the Desilijic kajidic.
